commitResults.messageBody:
Replace missing assignee filter

The assignee filter originally implemented in #384 was omitted in a
previous change.

Let's add the assignee filter for use in the existing filter bar.

commitResults.messageTitle: Create new base view for reviews dashboard
commitResults.messageBody:
Let's create a new view as a base for the new reviews dashboard
feature.

Make text clickable in toolbar instead of just icon

Let's move to include the text to trigger the click action,
so that users don't have to click on the (small) icons

Co-authored-by: Marcus Soh <macussoh38@gmail.com>

commitResults.messageTitle: Update label remove button to reset instead

commitResults.messageBody: Align remove all button to expectations of function

commitResults.messageTitle: Show issues and PRs without milestones in 'Contributions' preset view (#392)
commitResults.messageBody:
Include issues/PRs without milestones in 'Contributions' preset view

The 'Contributions' preset view doesn't include issues/PRs without a milestone.

However, issues and PRs without milestones are contributions as well, and should
be included in the 'Contributions' preset view.

Let's show issues and PRs without milestones in the 'Contributions' preset view as well.

commitResults.messageTitle: Remove repo from suggestions if invalid (#403)
commitResults.messageBody:
WATcher does not remove a repo from suggestions if it is not valid. 
This results in invalid repositories shown under suggestions if 
the user has previously entered one. 

Let's remove invalid repos from suggestions since users do not need 
to choose them.

commitResults.messageTitle: Handle templates using BehaviorSubject and async pipe (#407)
commitResults.messageBody:
There is an error that appears when switching to an invalid repo. 
In the hidden-groups component, the templates are undefined before 
the view is initialized and they become defined afterwards, 
causing an NG0100 error. 

Let's use a BehaviorSubject with an initial value of null to emit the 
card template after the view has been initialized and use the async 
pipe so that the error does not occur.

commitResults.messageTitle: Remove gap between bottom of window and horizontal sidebar (#420)
commitResults.messageBody:
The height of each column in `card-view` component is set to 77vh,
which results in a gap between the bottom of the window and the
horizontal sidebar. 

The content should fill up the remaining height of the window instead
of leaving a gap.

Let's use a flexbox to allow the content to dynamically change its
height to fill up the remaining space instead of having a fixed height.

commitResults.messageTitle: Sync items per page to filter change (#386)
commitResults.messageBody:
Modify responsiveness of filters to screen size change

When the Items per page count changed, the UI takes some time to 
adjust accordingly. We should make the UI sync right after the change.

Let's update the page size of paginator.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add side border to draft PR cards (#426)
commitResults.messageBody: Add side border to draft PR cards

commitResults.messageTitle: Change keep filters to use slider button
commitResults.messageBody:
Functionality of keep filters icon is not clear.

Let's change it to use a slider button with
more obvious descriptions instead.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix incorrect behaviour when filtering by assignee in issues with multiple assignees (#415)
commitResults.messageBody:
Hide assignees not selected in filter

For issues with multiple assignees, having one of the assignees selected
in the filter displays all other assignees as groups.

This is misleading behaviour since the assignees that are not selected
are expected to be hidden.

Let's add a check for if the group is selected in the filter before
displaying the data.

Remove the use of magic strings for filter options

All of the predefined filter options values are magic literals. This
makes it hard to change or update any filter options without having
to change all manually.

Let's create enums constants with the same values to replace the
magic literals.

The enums constants will also allow us to create mappings for URL
encoding dynamically.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add drop shadow to filter section (#428)
commitResults.messageBody:
Add drop shadow to filter section

The lack of separation between the filter section and the dashboard
might make it hard for users to realise that their dashboard is
partially covered.

Let's add a simple drop shadow to show some form of elevation and
separation.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fixes view on view on GitHub (#414)
commitResults.messageBody:
View on GitHub should include the filters that are selected on
WATcher as it should be the same state as WATcher

By using the URL to encode the search string, we can view on GitHub
with the filters applied

Let's,
* Combine all filters into a search string
* Encode the search string to be sent using url
